QuestData.Title: Notify Arlos
QuestData.Description: We must notify General Arlos at once. I've known the captain for a long time and, believe me, he is one of the more careful ones.$B$BWho knows how many cultists have been smuggled into our settlements in Northrend in other ships? This could be disastrous.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to General Arlos inside the Inner Hold at Valiance Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for your concern, $n. We were made aware of the situation not too long ago.$B$BCounselor Talbot assures me that this was an isolated incident and not a cause for military concern.$B$BOur civilian authorities will make sure everyone involved is properly prosecuted.
